lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an Associated Press report in the college basketball roundup in some editions on Wednesday misidentified the location of the men’s game between St. John’s and Georgetown, which the Red Storm won in overtime. It was at Madison Square Garden, not Carnesecca Arena.
